Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 4, 5, 1, 3, 2. Social status: 5, 3, 1, 4, 2. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4
* 0.6
* 0.615
* 0.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4: Incorrect
* 0.6: Incorrect
* 0.615: Incorrect
* 0.7: Correct
